scripts.android:build: sh clean-cxx.sh && npx expo prebuild --platform android && sh fix-android-icons-padding.sh && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.build: sh clean-cxx.sh && npx expo prebuild --platform android && sh fix-android-icons-padding.sh && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.ios: npx expo prebuild --platform ios && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && expo run:ios
scripts.prints:iphone: sh checkBuildForPrints.sh --ios & killall -9 Terminal & osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd '$(pwd)' && yarn start"' & wait && detox test --configuration iphone.debug e2e/iphone.test.js && sh organize.sh iphone && xcrun simctl shutdown all
scripts.prints:ipad: sh checkBuildForPrints.sh --ios & killall -9 Terminal & osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd '$(pwd)' && yarn start"' & wait && detox test --configuration ipad.debug e2e/ipad.test.js && sh organize.sh ipad && xcrun simctl shutdown all
scripts.prints:phone: sh checkBuildForPrints.sh --android & killall -9 Terminal & osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd '$(pwd)' && yarn start"' & wait && detox test --configuration android.debug e2e/android.test.js --headless; sh organize.sh android; adb emu kill || adb devices | grep emulator | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I {} adb -s {} emu kill; adb start-server; adb devices | grep emulator | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I {} adb -s {} emu avd wipe-data
scripts.prints:tablet: sh checkBuildForPrints.sh --android & killall -9 Terminal & osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd '$(pwd)' && yarn start"' & wait && detox test --configuration tablet.debug e2e/tablet.test.js --headless; sh organize.sh tablet; adb emu kill || adb devices | grep emulator | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I {} adb -s {} emu kill; adb start-server; adb devices | grep emulator | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I {} adb -s {} emu avd wipe-data
